Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Reroute at Damen/Ohio
ShortDescription: 50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, Chicago, Western, Grand & Damen, due to police activity near Damen/Ohio.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Damen, Chicago, Western, Grand, then resume their normal route on Damen, due to police activity near Damen/Ohio.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier mechanical problem at Western (O'Hare Branch). Service resuming allow extra time

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier mechanical problem at Western (O'Hare Branch)

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
